text: Wall Street is a street in Lower Manhattan, New York City. It runs southeast from Broadway, through the Financial District to South Street on the East River. It is home to the New York Stock Exchange, the world's largest stock exchange and Federal Hall. Most headquarters of many other American exchanges NYSE, NASDAQ, AMEX, NYMEX, NYBOT are also run from Wall Street. The term "Wall Street" is often used to refer to the U.S. financial industry or the U.S. economy as a whole. Category:Landmarks in Manhattan
title: Wall Street
